data.text: @cantbekimi Hi, proper packing of the articles is the sole responsibility of the customer. ~Linda
@thisisethanhunt Yes you can. However, please remove the battery, if any, before placing it in check-in baggage. ~Linda
@guptavivek29 Mr Gupta, sorry to note your experience. However, this is the best our team could offer. We hope to serve you better in the future. ~Linda
@jayantsingh7370 Hi, please allow us sometime to check with the team. Meanwhile, please DM us the make & color of the laptop. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@SalesElvo Hi, we believe you have collected the parcel as of now. We regret the long wait and wish you a great day. ~Navi
@IndiGo6E Rest, we suggest you delete the tweet you posted with your PNR Code as it contains Personal Information. Thanks. (2/2) ~Navi

data.text: @rijhwani_rahul Mr Rijhwani, sorry for such an unpleasant experience. We have been taking all the necessary steps to control mosquitoes and only allow passengers to board once the fumigation is done. We will make sure to pass on your feedback. (1/2)

@shubham_14994 Mr Ruparel, we request you to visit https://t.co/58PvLBgbG3 to download your Boarding Pass and let us know via DM in case you need more assistance. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

urls.title: How to Check-in | Print Boarding Pass - IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offers you multiple check-in options. Save time by online check-in or using the IndiGo mobile app. You can also download & print boarding pass online.

data.text: @Keveningstar Dr Prakash, above mentioned can be carried in the Check-In Luggage and we request you to declare the same while submitting your luggage at the Check-In Counters. Thanks. ~Navi
@cheenuwins Hi, we regret to note this and request you to DM us your Contact Number and PNR so we may get in touch with you to gather more details on your experience with us. Thanks. ~Navi
@vineethjt1 You're most welcome. 😊 ~Navi
@Old_Man_Garou You're most welcome. Do let us know via DM in case you need more assistance. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@amankohli22 Hi Mr Kohli, please DM us how may we assist you? Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@barwarmusic Hi, we request you to carry the Wall Clock in your Check-In Baggage and the BP Machine in the Hand Baggage. Thanks. ~Navi

@hivikash23 Sir, we regret such an experience. We try our best to fly on time, however, sometimes due to the uncertain nature of our operating factors, flight schedule changes get unavoidable. We sincerely hope to serve you better in the future.~Vaishali
@nikhilpghag Mr Ghag, we have duly noted and shared the feedback with the concerned department. Thanks.~Vaishali
@keshri95 Sir, thanks for sharing. We will share the feedback with the concerned team for review and rectification.~Vaishali

@Bhavesh280998 Mr Choudhary, as checked, 6E-975 is delayed by 5 mins and the updated departure time of the flight is 2205 hrs. We regret the inconvenience and wish you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi

@AshokTak10 Sir, as checked, the waiver was already given for the handbag as a one-time gesture and the excess in check-in luggage was charged. Please visit https://t.co/qHYQwbubKQ for detailed info. We hope for your understanding in this regard.~Vaishali

data.text: @AyushiN03143136 We advise you to visit https://t.co/sqVBx8d70E for detailed information. Thanks.~Vaishal
@PriyankaJ1993 Hi, we regret the inconvenience. Please allow us some time to get it checked. We will update you.~Vaishali

@NesarVinod Sir, we regret such an experience. We try our best to fly on time, however, sometimes due to the uncertain nature of our operating factors, flight schedule changes get unavoidable. We sincerely hope to serve you better in the future.~Vaishali

@Old_Man_Garou Sir, you may share an image of your Card ( showing the first 6 and last 4 digits only ) along with your ID Proof and PNR to fcu@goindigo.in for Card Verification. Post the card verification, you may proceed with the Web Check-In. ~Navi

@virus_o_philic Mr Mukherjee, sorry for such an unpleasant experience. We have been taking all the necessary steps to control mosquitoes and only allow passengers to board once the fumigation is done. We hope you are doing well and will make sure to pass on your feedback. ~Navi

@imrohanjamber Mr Jamber, as checked, the flight is airborne as of now and you may get in touch with our Airport Team at the arrivals for the assistance. You may also DM us your PNR to check. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@Avijeetsriv Hi, we regret the inconvenience and would like to look into this. Please DM us your PNR for the same so we may assist you. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

data.text: @AmitavaNri Sir, while we are checking on this, we request you to get in touch with our Airport Team for any real-time assistance. Thanks. ~Navi

@NityaRamanan Ms Ramanan, we regret the experience and request you to visit https://t.co/TqIdHo0WOE to pre-book the International Connection Baggage. Please DM us your PNR and Contact Number in case you need more assistance. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: Baggage International Connection
urls.description: IndiGo offers great prices on purchasing prepaid excess baggage when you are travelling on your domestic IndiGo flight and connecting to/from another international airline. This allowance is over and above your eligible baggage allowance. #Please note that if the payment is to be made in any other currency than Indian Rupee, the fee(s) will be calculated as per the conversion rate prevalent at the time of payment. Adult(s) (> 12 years) Book extra seat(s) for less and travel with more space, comfort & 10

data.text: @abbasrazvi Mr Razvi, we regret the inconvenience and request you to DM us your PNR so we may look into this and have your feedback shared with our Concerned Team for further review. Wishing you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@abbasrazvi Mr Razvi, the Alcoholic Beverage needs to be in Retail Packaging and needs to be packed appropriately to prevent damage/ leakage. You may visit Carriage of Alcoholic Beverages at https://t.co/tDEfGzIsU6 for more info on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
